import React, { useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' import Programs from '../components/Programs' function ProgramsScreen({ match }) { const [programs, setPrograms] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchPrograms(){ const { data } = await axios.get('/api/programs/') setPrograms(data) } //call the data fetchPrograms() }, []) const program_id = useParams(); return (
Go Back

{program.name}

 {program.description} Age: {program.ageGroup} Fees: {program.fees} KD
) } export default ProgramsScreen
